title: Instructional Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Precision Teaching and Big Data Integration: Elementary Mathematics Instructional Strategy Development

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three trends in domestic and international precision teaching method research using literature analysis tools.
Learners can design two or more methods for measuring math learning outcomes applying big data analysis techniques.

Learners collaborate with three peers to analyze learner data (grades, error patterns) within four weeks, develop ≥2 personalized math teaching strategies (e.g., individualized learning plans, adaptive assessments), and submit a final report meeting ≥4 of 5 peer feedback rubric items.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
